comment.author: 17643926@N00
comment._content: It's not surprising that her audience consists almost entirely of men; women would have risked their respectability if they had stopped to listen to her speak. Miss McKenzie was visiting from Britian, one of a group who took great pleasure in throwing stones at the windows of government buildings. Having been raised to be prim and proper, such anti-social behavior must have been very liberating for her and the other suffragettes.
